overview:
Tim Allison is a 22 year Game Industry Asia Pacific business development executive. His background includes Sega Marketing Manager Australia, VP International Sales Interplay and is currently the CEO of Omake Interactive Services. Tim begun Asian based JV companies for Interplay in the late 1990s. His focus for 10 years has been taking western content into Asia. His company Omake specializes in online games both core and casual, they have generated over $40m in revenue and licensing fees for their clients from Asian partnerships. Clients have included Turbine, Flying Lab, Trymedia, Optics China, IAH Singapore, PlayFirst, Sparkplay.

Tims unique experience is built up from dealing across all of Asia/India/Australia with a wide variety of content from core, casual MMO to internet content and platforms. His content clients tend to be cutting edge developers from both the USA and Europe. Applying their content across the different markets requires a wider understanding of technology and Asian trends.
